markdownRemark.html:
The Warewulf project is pleased to announce the release of v4.5.5, now available on GitHub.

Warewulf v4.5.5 Warewulf v4.5.5 includes usability improvements and bugfixes for the v4.5.x line. This includes the restoration of previous behavior when running DHCP in "static" mode, reliability improvements for wwctl overlay edit, and fixes for overlay autobuild.

Let us know if you encounter any issues. v4.5.6 is already planned, and we intend to continue to improve and maintain the v4.5.x line while working on the next major release, v4.6.0.

Thank you, as always, for being a part of the Warewulf community!
